name: mightoraDocumentWorkflows
instanceNameFormat: Mightora Power Platform Workflows Documentation Generator
description: Generates comprehensive documentation for Power Platform Workflows and Power Automate Flows. This task extracts and documents all workflow information including triggers, parameters, states, execution settings, and creates individual markdown files with PlantUML diagrams for Power Automate flows. Perfect for creating detailed documentation and tracking workflows across environments.
author: mightoraio

inputs.name: solutionPath
inputs.label: Solution Source Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the solution source folder containing workflow XML files and Power Automate JSON files.

inputs.name: outputLocation
inputs.label: Output Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to save the generated workflows documentation and individual Power Automate flow markdown files.

inputs.name: includeDetails
inputs.label: Include Detailed Information
inputs.helpMarkDown: Include detailed workflow information including triggers, parameters, settings, and individual Power Automate flow documentation with PlantUML diagrams.

inputs.name: includeUsage
inputs.label: Include Usage Statistics
inputs.helpMarkDown: Include usage statistics and categorization of workflows including both XML workflows and Power Automate flows.
